Package Actions

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
Actions.Helper
public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
this class for generic action which is needed in script like: 1-take screenshot when the test cases fail 2-choose test data file with specific format 3-retrieve data from those test data and send them to data provider which in turn send them to test method

    • chooseFile

      public static java.lang.Object[][] chooseFile​(java.lang.String fileExtension, java.lang.String fileName)
      this method responsible for:choosing spesific file with specific format
      Parameters:
      fileExtension - to pass fileExtension from dataProvider method which came from testngSuite.xml
      fileName - to pass fileName from dataProvider method which came from testngSuite.xml
      Returns:
      2d array from type object to receive the data in data provider

    • readFromExcelFile

      public static java.lang.Object[][] readFromExcelFile​(java.lang.String filePath) throws java.io.IOException
      this method responsible for: read data from Excel file
      Parameters:
      filePath - to pass filepath from chooseFile method
      Returns:
      2d array from type object to receive the data in data provider
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if file is not found
